queries.query: SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='pr1' AND pin='pin1';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='pr2' AND pin='pin2';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='pr3' AND pin='pin3';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='pr4' AND pin='pin4';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='pr5' AND pin='pin5';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='' or 1=1 -- AND pin=;
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='' UNION SELECT cardNo from CreditCards where accNo=7032 -- AND pin=;
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='doe' AND pin=0; drop table users
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='' AND pin=convert(int, (select top 1 name from sysobject where xtype'u'))
SELECT acct FROM users WHERE login='legalUser' AND ASCII(SUBSTRING((SELECT TOP 1 name FROM sysobjects)1,1)) > X WAITFOR 10 -- AND pin=;
SELECT acct FROM users WHERE login='' AND pin=0; exec{char(0x73687574646f776e)};

select COUNT(*), nom_eleve FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre AND LIVRE.titre = 'Fascination1' GROUP BY nom_eleve;

select COUNT(*), nom_eleve FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre AND LIVRE.titre = 'Ahhhhhhhhh1' GROUP BY nom_eleve;

select COUNT(*), nom_eleve FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre AND LIVRE.titre = 'FascinatdqEDZDion1' GROUP BY nom_eleve;

select COUNT(*), nom_eleve FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre AND LIVRE.titre = 'Ahiiiehhhhhhhh1' GROUP BY nom_eleve;

select COUNT(*), nom_eleve FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre AND LIVRE.titre = 'Fascinatqzdion1' GROUP BY nom_eleve;

select COUNT(*), nom_eleve FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre AND LIVRE.titre = 'Ahhhhefzhhhhh1' GROUP BY nom_eleve;

SELECT date_rendu, nom_eleve  FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve  AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre  AND LIVRE.titre = 'aaaaFascinationne1' ORDER BY date_rendu DESC;

SELECT date_rendu, nom_eleve  FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve  AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre  AND LIVRE.titre = 'Ehhhhhhhyyhhh1' ORDER BY date_rendu DESC;

SELECT date_rendu, nom_eleve  FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve  AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre  AND LIVRE.titre = 'wwwFascinationne1' ORDER BY date_rendu DESC;

SELECT date_rendu, nom_eleve  FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve  AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre  AND LIVRE.titre = 'Ehhttthhhhhhhh1' ORDER BY date_rendu DESC;

SELECT date_rendu, nom_eleve  FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve  AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre  AND LIVRE.titre = 'qqqFascinationne1' ORDER BY date_rendu DESC;

SELECT date_rendu, nom_eleve  FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve  AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre  AND LIVRE.titre = 'Ehhhhhhhhjjhh1' ORDER BY date_rendu DESC;
SELECT sum(total.an)/ 17 AS moyenne FROM (SELECT count(*) AS an FROM EMPRUNT WHERE YEAR='1012' GROUP BY MONTH AND DECADE='5') AS total;
SELECT sum(total.an)/ 17 AS moyenne FROM (SELECT count(*) AS an FROM EMPRUNT WHERE YEAR='1017' GROUP BY MONTH AND DECADE='5') AS total;
SELECT sum(total.an)/ 17 AS moyenne FROM (SELECT count(*) AS an FROM EMPRUNT WHERE YEAR='1088' GROUP BY MONTH AND DECADE='5') AS total;
SELECT sum(total.an)/ 17 AS moyenne FROM (SELECT count(*) AS an FROM EMPRUNT WHERE YEAR='1099' GROUP BY MONTH AND DECADE='5') AS total;
SELECT sum(total.an)/ 17 AS moyenne FROM (SELECT count(*) AS an FROM EMPRUNT WHERE YEAR='1014' GROUP BY MONTH AND DECADE='5') AS total;

DELIMITER // CREATE TRIGGER 'MULTIPLE_COMMENT' BEFORE INSERT ON 'COMMENTAIRE' FOR EACH ROW BEGIN DECLARE NB_ID INTEGER; IF(NEW.id_evt is not null) THEN SELECT COUNT(*) INTO NB_ID FROM 'COMMENTAIRE' WHERE id_eleve=NEW.id_eleve AND id_evt=NEW.id_evt; END IF; IF(NEW.id_jeu is not null) THEN SELECT COUNT(*) INTO NB_ID FROM 'COMMENTAIRE' WHERE id_eleve=NEW.id_eleve AND id_jeu=NEW.id_jeu; END IF; IF (NB_ID>0) THEN SET NEW.id_eleve = NULL; SET NEW.id_jeu = NULL; SET NEW.id_evt = NULL; END IF; END;  //
